en.today: The Leo moon aligns with Uranus and Pluto early this morning, dearest Aries, stirring up intense news. Find your center before catching up with friends or current events, easing into your routines. You'll crave pleasant distractions as the hours pass, and will gravitate toward leisure in lieu of work. However, a harsh opposition between Mercury and Saturn cautions against running from your responsibilities, or you could feel overwhelmed later. This celestial exchange may also trigger fixations or obsessive behaviors, so be mindful to adjust your expectations if perfectionism starts to creep up. Close out your night with positive affirmations, fueling the fire within.

en.today: Luna continues through your sign, darling Leo, aligning with Uranus and Pluto early this morning. Loved ones are likely to surprise you under these cosmic conditions, and fresh alliances may be forged. These vibes can also be helpful when breaking into new social spheres, so don't hesitate to reach out to the people you look up to. You'll feel increasingly self-assured as the hours pass, and you could see significant gains while chasing personal goals. A stubborn energy emerges once Mercury opposes Saturn, but you'll want to choose your battles wisely to avoid burning bridges or creating unnecessary challenges.

en.today: Vivid dreams could liven up your slumber early this morning, dear bull, as the Leo moon aspects Uranus and Pluto. Consider if there are any messages to be drawn from your astral realm encounters, especially when it comes to breaking through obstacles and finding success. Increase your responsibilities and these aspirations with sustainable strategies. Guard against distractions while Mercury opposes Saturn, and take note of how often you reach for your phone. If you struggle to put down your devices, try throwing them in a drawer to help curb the temptation to message friends or scroll feeds.

en.today: You could awaken to exciting news or unexplained blessings, sweet Gemini, as the Leo moon aspects Uranus and Pluto. Set clear intentions upon awakening, especially if a busy day lies ahead. Curiosity builds when you invest in projects or people that spark genuine interest, as Luna increases your ability to absorb new information. However, a harsh opposition between Mercury and Saturn may cause your emotional intelligence to suffer, so be mindful to lead with compassion while trying to understand where others are coming from. These vibes also emphasize the importance of finding balance within your professional aspirations and private affairs.

kh.today: អ្នកអាចភ្ញាក់ពីដំណឹងគួរឱ្យរំភើបឬពរដែលមិនអាចពន្យល់បាន Gemini ផ្អែមដូចជាទិដ្ឋភាព Leo Moon Uranus និង Pluto ។កំណត់បំណងច្បាស់លាស់នៅពេលភ្ញាក់ដឹងខ្លួនជាពិសេសប្រសិនបើថ្ងៃមមាញឹកនៅខាងមុខ។ការចង់ដឹងចង់ឃើញបង្កើតនៅពេលអ្នកវិនិយោគលើគម្រោងឬប្រជាជនដែលបង្កឱ្យមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ពិតប្រាកដនៅពេលដែល Luna បង្កើនសមត្ថភាពរបស់អ្នកក្នុងការស្រូបយកព័ត៌មានថ្មី។ទោះយ៉ាងណាការប្រឆាំងយ៉ាងខ្លាំងរវាងបារតនិងសៅរ៍អាចបណ្តាលឱ្យវៃឆ្លាតខាងផ្លូវចិត្តរបស់អ្នកនឹងរងទុក្ខដូច្នេះសូមចងចាំដោយការអាណិតអាសូរនៅពេលព្យាយាមយល់ពីកន្លែងដែលអ្នកផ្សេងទៀតចេញពីផ្ទះ។ភាពរស់រវើកទាំងនេះក៏សង្កត់ធ្ងន់លើសារៈសំខាន់នៃការស្វែងរកតុល្យភាពក្នុងការប្រាថ្នាប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈរបស់អ្នកនិងកិច្ចការឯកជន។
